purpose: Define the mechanisms that direct, coordinate, and regulate internal system activities across all modules, engines, and phases.

orchestration.description: Coordinates the execution order of modules, engines, telemetry flows, and policy checks.

governanceRouting.description: Ensures all system decisions align with the governance model.

telemetryIngestion.description: Collects and validates telemetry from heartbeat, integrity, sync, predictive models, and emergent behaviour.

runtimeManagement.description: Controls script execution, monitors failures, and ensures safe runtime behaviour for both PowerShell and Node pipelines.

integrityEnforcement.description: Validates manifests, seals, and system identity before allowing any operation.

controlContracts.consistency: The system must behave consistently when given the same inputs.
controlContracts.reversibility: The system must support rollback to stable states.
controlContracts.safety: No module may bypass integrity or governance checks.

summary.statement: The control plane provides the rules, processes, and decision pathways that allow WyneOS to function as a coordinated enterprise system.
